notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: ML conducted all analyses. ML and BMB created the figures and tables. ML, BMB, JD and JM wrote SAS and R code to link and explore the data. DJDE conceived the project; managed all applications for access and interactions with StatCan and MOHLTC; and wrote the first draft of the manuscript. JM contributed to access applications. All authors took part in research meetings concerning data analysis goals, strategies and challenges; contributed to data analysis and visualization; and revised the manuscript for intellectual content. All authors have read and approved the final manuscript as submitted.
